name: Hero Splendor Plus
description: The Hero Splendor Plus is powered by 97.2cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 7.91 bhp and a torque of 8.05 Nm.Hero Splendor Plus comes up with combined braking system of both wheels.

name: Hero Xtreme 200S
description: Hero Xtreme 200S is a sports bike powered by 199.6cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 17.8 bhp and a torque of 16.45 Nm

name: Hero Splendor iSmart 110
description: The Splendor iSmart 110 is Hero MotoCorpâ€™s first ingeniously developed motorcycle. Powering the Splendor iSmart 110 is a new 110cc engine that produces 9bhp and 9Nm of torque, and is mated to a four-speed gearbox

name: Hero Maestro Edge 125
description: The Maestro Edge 125 is the first scooter in India to feature fuel-injection technology The Hero Maestro Edge 125 is powered by 124.6cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 9 bhp and a torque of 10.4 Nm.

name: Hero HF Deluxe
description: The Hero HF Deluxe is powered by 97.2cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 7.91 bhp and a torque of 8.05 Nm. This HF Deluxe bike weighs 110 kg and has a fuel tank capacity of 9.1 liters.
